channel.title: Client wont connect to the server
channel.description:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Well i know this is probably a simple problem but its been ages since i last coded and i am having some trouble
My client wont connect to my server
i know where to change the IP in GUI and i changed it from 127.0.0.1 to my servers IP but it wont work but it does when i change it back to 127.0.0.1 so i downloaded the portforward checker to check whether i portforwarded correctly and it says i am, any ideas?
also now when i try connectingit logs me straight out and on the CLI it says "invalid server: etctetc.no-ip.biz" and no tat isnt the name of my server

item.title: Client wont connect to the server
item.dc:creator: @a_d_i_o_n a d i o n
item.description:
@a_d_i_o_n wrote:

nothing seems to be working at all, ive tried everything, new clients, different sources i have run 4 servers before and never had this problem nothing seems to work

Read full topic

@mrtool wrote:

yup im having the same problem- i want other connecting to my client but when i change it to my no-ip i get the gay null shit.

then use either your ip or your no-ip duc

mangalover51:

yes i know that but it wont let others connect

item.title: Client wont connect to the server
item.dc:creator: @a_d_i_o_n a d i o n
item.description:
@a_d_i_o_n wrote:

mangalover51:

set it to your no-ip duc like frunescape2.no-ip.org but don’t use that one it’s just and ex. or try 0.0.0.0 it will work the same as 127.0.0.1

I want it so if i send the client out it will connect to my server but 127.0.0.1 will only work if i want to connect and i did set it to the no-ip duc but that doesnt work which is the problem

Read full topic
